product_overview: Bazzar Staff Mobile is a React-based staff management mobile web application leveraging Vite, TailwindCSS, and Supabase for a responsive and secure experience. It provides staff users with functionalities like authentication, dashboard access, market statistics, and service management within an optimized mobile interface.
core_goals: Provide secure and robust user authentication with role management.
Deliver staff users a responsive and informative dashboard to manage daily operations.
Present market statistics and leaderboard views to inform business decisions.
Facilitate easy navigation across app sections via bottom navigation.
Ensure seamless integration with Supabase backend for realtime data and authentication.
Maintain high visual and interactive standards using TailwindCSS styling and animations.
key_features: Authentication system enabling user login and potential role-based access control.
Main dashboard page tailored for staff users displaying relevant operations and information.
Market statistics and leaderboard pages presenting business insights and performance metrics.
Bottom navigation component for consistent and intuitive app navigation.
Staff services management page to facilitate handling of staff-related services.
Supabase client integration for backend communication, authentication, and data storage.

Visual and UI improvements using TailwindCSS including gradient backgrounds, blurred transparent forms, icons in input fields, animated background blobs, and styled buttons as specified in design documentation.
user_flow_summary: User visits app and is presented with a stylish login page featuring gradient background and blurred transparent form with icon-enhanced inputs.
Upon entering valid credentials, user is authenticated via Supabase and navigated to the staff dashboard.
From the dashboard, users can navigate using bottom navigation to access Market Statistics, Leaderboard, or Staff Services pages.
Users interact with statistics views to analyze market data and leaderboard rankings relevant to staff roles.
Staff can manage services efficiently through the dedicated Staff Services page.
User can log out or switch roles as permitted within authentication system.
validation_criteria: TailwindCSS styles load correctly ensuring visual elements like gradient backgrounds, animations, and input styling are present.
Authentication flow is fully functional with correct login and role management.
Dashboard loads and displays proper staff data and interface elements.
Navigation through bottom navigation is consistent and allows access to all key pages.
Market statistics and leaderboard data display accurately and update as required.
Staff services management features are accessible and functional.
Supabase client connects successfully to backend services.
Browser refresh and cache clear fix styling issues as documented in design fixes.
